name: The Norseman (Marcos GamesDev)
description:
The Norseman is a two player cooperative game made on Unreal Engine 4. One of the player plays as the detective with the digital game while the other plays as his partner with a pdf diary that you can download from here:  http://stefanhristov.com/thenorseman/

Sinopsis: "You have been investigating a series of murders for several months, the only thing in common is the symbol left by the murderer. Now, the prosecutor that was helping you with the case has been murdered as well.  The last message that you got from him mentioned an important discovery he made about the case. Now, you head to his office to find out what that discovery was, with, of course, the help of your partner".
